entity_name: J. B. Adams, J. A. Mintz, W. R. Wannall, J. G. Deegan, R. L. Shackelford, W. O. Cregar, S. F. Phillips

The documents primarily focus on the testimony of Alan G. Therefore, their roles, connections, timeline of involvement, and significance in the JFK assassination context cannot be determined from these documents.
